title: Madras HC stays Rs 80 cr GST demand on Hyundai seconded employees pay
description: The company had challenged the December 23, 2023 tax demand notice from the GST authorities, which had considered the entire salary amount paid to seconded employees as taxable. Secondment, a common practice among global companies, is a temporary arrangement in which an employee transitions from one role to another, typically within the same group of companies, within or outside the country for a specified duration.
